channel.title: business life on Greg McMullen
channel.description: Recent content in business life on Greg McMullen

item.title: Preparing for Work Life
item.description: While you are in school, no one really tells you how to prepare for work life. Honestly, I wasn’t sure I could make it in the real world. However, I’m currently working a full time job, paid off 2 student loans (2 to go), picked up my cell phone bill and bought a car! The best part is that I’m only 23 years old. No one can prepare you for the real world better than yourself!
